feed.title: Mindfulness
feed.subtitle: feel, think, learn and share. Be happy!

entry.title: Hank Quinlan, Horrible Cop, Launches Site

link.title: Hank Quinlan, Horrible Cop, Launches Site

entry.content: Well. Finally got around to putting this old website together. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be.
entry.summary: Well. Finally got around to putting this old website together. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be.
